note.p: Physician. MD, Cambridge, 1831. Lecturer, St Bartholomew’s Hospital, London, from 1832; physician, 1841–63. Physician-extraordinary to Queen Victoria, 1870; physician-in-ordinary, 1873. President, Royal Medical and Chirurgical Society, 1869. Fellow, Royal College of Physicians, 1832; president, 1871–5. Created baronet, 1874. FRS 1846.
